channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 14:46 Threat of Artbill! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk into shelter!
item.description: 游댮 14:46 Threat of Artbill! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk into shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 14:28 Fragrant anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 14:28 Fragrant anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_.
